item.title: Public Void Help Rep++ if helped
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

I followed this tutorial, but i got a compiling error
http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=1832

Heres the codes i added

}
if (command.startsWith("say") && (playerRights >= 0)) {
    {
        if(forceMsg != null) {
        try{
        String otherPName = command.substring(4);
        int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
        if(otherPIndex != -1) {
            client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
            p.forceMsg = forceMsg;
            p.mustsay = 1;
            sM("Now making the player say : '"+forceMsg+"'.");
        }
        else { sM("That name does not exist, or they are not online."); }
    } catch(Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..."); }
}
else if(forceMsg == null) {
    sM("Please use ::setsay (message here) to set the message.");
}
}

} if(command.startsWith("setsay") && (playerRights >= 0)) { { String setMsg = command.substring(7); forceMsg = setMsg; sM("Your message has now been set to '"+forceMsg+"'"); } }

public String forceMsg; public int mustsay = 0;

} public void completeSay() { txt4 = forceMsg; string4UpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; //sM("Completed Say."); } public void say(String msg){ txt4 = msg; string4UpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; }

There all in the correct places, now heres my compile error

client.java:15987: illegal start of expression public void completeSay() { ^ client.java:15987: illegal start of expression public void completeSay() { ^ client.java:15987: ';' expected public void completeSay() { ^ client.java:15993: illegal start of expression public void say(String msg){ ^ client.java:15993: illegal start of expression public void say(String msg){ ^ client.java:15993: ';' expected public void say(String msg){ ^ client.java:15993: ';' expected public void say(String msg){ ^ 7 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
